3. What does this indicate .DC Vds 0 5 0.5 Vgs 0 5 1?

answers.a: The voltage Vds will be swept from 0 to 5V in steps of 1V for every value of Vgs.
answers.b: The voltage Vgs will be swept from 0 to 5V in steps of 1V for every value of Vds. ()
answers.c: The voltage Vds will be swept from 0 to 1V in steps of 5V for every value of Vgs.
